Text: Will give this a shot based dually on Kat Dennings, and 20-40's excellent taste.  Been a fan of Kat Dennings' quirky characters ever since Raise Your Voice.  SHE could have played Juno with aplomb!  Thanks for the small--trial as it were--encode.

@ ALL - Please LOGIN (create an account if you do not have one) and click the [+] symbol beside QUALITY at top of page for ALL torrents you DL from 20-40.  It makes a difference; shows you care and that his work is appreciated! Don't forget to seed back at least 1/1...

twentyforty: Why did you cut off the credits in the middle of a great song? Not making a rip of the whole movie, but breaking off part way into the end credits, is the most annoying thing about your encodes. It shows disrespect for the film. Usually I don't mind so much, but in this case, I really do.

But thanks for this up. This is a wonderful film, and without this rip, I might not have learned about it.
Thanks Mate. A pleasure as always.
